thread.section_title: Novotel London West - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: rather nice
thread.title_full: rather nice - Review of Novotel London West, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: why1so1serious1
title: rather nice
text: i've stayed at the novotel london west and at the novotel paddington and i do have to say that the novotel paddington had rooms which were a bit more comfy but all in all i loved the hotel it was nice and quiet but yet not to far off from the busyness of london itself which i completely loved and there was a lovely breakfast which all kinds of stuff that i like and 2 kinds of bacon ! :)
